Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Relates to late fees for failure to timely complete the on-line training course for lobbyists and clients
Summary: Authorizes the imposition of late fees for failure to timely complete the on-line training course for lobbyists and clients.
LawCode: Amd ยง94, Exec L; amd ยง1-d, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the legislative law, in relation to education and training in ethics and lobbying
